mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), `body` = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, relTypeCode = 'comment', relId = #{relId}, goodReactionPoint = 0, badReactionPoint = 0
mapper.select: SELECT reply.*, IFNULL(SUM(reactionPoint.point),0) AS extra__sumReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(reactionPoint.point > 0,reactionPoint.point,0)),0) AS extra__goodReactionPoint, IFNULL(SUM(IF(reactionPoint.point < 0,reactionPoint.point,0)),0) AS extra__badReactionPoint, member.name AS 'name' FROM reply INNER JOIN `member` ON reply.memberId = member.id LEFT JOIN reactionPoint ON reply.id = reactionPoint.relId AND reactionPoint.relTypeCode = 'article' WHERE reply.id = #{id}
SELECT reply.*, member.name FROM reply INNER JOIN `member` ON reply.memberId = member.id INNER JOIN article ON reply.relId = article.id WHERE reply.relId = #{id} ORDER BY reply.id DESC
